metadata.description: A curated collection of Claude Code plugins

plugins.name: claude-basic-planning
plugins.description: A structured workflow plugin with Analyze, Plan, and Execute commands

plugins.name: pm-vision
plugins.description: Create and maintain product vision documentation

plugins.name: pm-architecture
plugins.description: Manage tech stack and architecture decisions (ADRs)

plugins.name: pm-prioritization
plugins.description: Manage product backlog with MoSCoW prioritization

plugins.name: pm-domain-knowledge
plugins.description: Document domain knowledge including entities, processes, and ubiquitous language

plugins.name: pm-requirements
plugins.description: BDD requirements with Gherkin feature files (Given-When-Then)
